content: That's a great list of snack ideas! I think I'll go with the "As You Wish" chocolate hearts, "Inconceivable!" cake, and the "Buttercup's Butter Cookies". They seem like the perfect fit for the theme. By the way, do you think I should have a photo booth set up with props like swords, crowns, and fake mustaches? It could be a fun way to capture some memorable moments from the night.
